md:
giải nghĩa từ "foreigner" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Foreigner /ˈfɒrɪnər/ (noun)

* A person who comes from a country that is not their own country.
* A person who is not a citizen of a particular country.

Example sentences:

* As a foreigner in Japan, I had trouble understanding the language.
* The company has a policy of hiring foreigners to work in their international department.

Related words:

* Foreign (adjective)
* Foreignness (noun)
* Foreigner (noun)
* Aliens (noun)

Note: The word "foreigner" can sometimes have a negative connotation, implying that someone is an outsider or does not belong. However, in modern usage, it is often used in a neutral or even positive sense to refer to people from other countries or cultures.
